contents.text: Welcome to Marqeta, the East Bay card issuing platform inspiring new possibilities for the world's most innovative companies.
For information on our merchant services, press 1.
To learn about our merchant services integration and features, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our merchant services specialist.

navigationGoals: I need a quick overview of how to integrate your merchant services features into our platform.
Integrate Marqeta’s merchant services into my veteran-owned small business and learn about all the integration features.
I want to review the API endpoints and callback configuration for your merchant services integration.
I need someone to explain how to integrate Marqeta’s merchant services into my online store, step by step.
I’d like a detailed overview of how to integrate your merchant services platform with my student-run lab’s online payment system.

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative about merchant services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss pricing and contract options with a merchant services sales representative.
Discuss pricing and onboarding for merchant services with a sales representative for my veteran-run startup.
I’d like to explore pricing models and volume discount options for Marqeta’s merchant services.
I’d like to discuss pricing and account setup options for merchant services before I commit.
I want to speak with someone about pricing and contract options for implementing merchant services in my startup.

contents.text: For details on our virtual card solutions, press 2.
To learn about our virtual card capabilities, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our virtual card specialist.

navigationGoals: I want details on your virtual card API capabilities for automated expense management.
Understand how Marqeta’s virtual card solution can streamline spending for my remote team.
I need to understand the tokenization workflow and encryption standards for your virtual card solution.
I want to learn how to generate and use virtual cards for secure purchases.
Can you explain the virtual card API features and how they could support my research expense management?

contents.text: To speak with a support specialist about virtual cards, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a virtual card support specialist.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing an issue with our virtual cards and need technical support.
Resolve an issue with my virtual cards—my transactions are being declined and need support.
I need assistance troubleshooting a declined virtual card transaction error in my test environment.
I’m having trouble accessing my virtual card details and need help retrieving them.
I’m experiencing errors when creating virtual cards in the sandbox environment and need troubleshooting assistance.
